name: places/ChIJSca3He9YwokR2VvyMSpGDKw
formattedAddress: 105 E 63rd St, New York, NY 10065, USA
adrFormatAddress: 105 E 63rd St, New York, NY 10065, USA

originalText.text:
Dr. Lissak is a one of a kind psychiatrist. He is extremely knowledgeable, kind, understanding and non judgmental. He doesn’t just hear you, but actually listens and validates you.
I have been in and out of ed treatment for years and have seen a million psychiatrist’s. Yeah, they hear you but they never truly listen. I have been lied to about meds, tricked and manipulated into taking medication that only harmed me more. I resented psychiatrists because I tried so many and they were all the same. I wondered how many of them even got a job at eating disorder units because they had little to no knowledge about eating disorders. It is known among ed clients that they dread seeing the psychiatrist because they get triggered or forced to go on meds, not listened to and invalidated.
Dr. Lissak has completely changed my views on psychiatrists and for once in my life I actually look forward to our sessions and not fear them. I admire his knowledge and how he truly cares about his clients.
